name: Hot Steel (itch)
description:
HOT STEEL

Grab a friend or foe and face off in the deep caverns to steal all of the riches know to man in this fact paced 1v1 Platformer game. Multiple game modes with a unique maze style level design to outplay your opponents.

This game was created in only 2 months by a group of 3 people

Jordan Robson

Devon Jenkin-Hunt

Owen Bates
